venue.name: New Bedford National Whaling Historical Park

item.description:
The second Thursday of every month New Bedford has an evening of entertainment sponsored by AHA! (art, history, and architecture). The group has gone many times and it's always fun. The theme for this evening, October 14, is Bounty of the South Coast. When you look on the calendar (link below) you will see lectures, gallery shows, and live music.

Here is the AHA! website: http://www.ahanewbedf...

There are a number of new art exhibits this month and I think it would be fun to check them out! After we check out a bunch of events, we'll grab some dinner.

You can park for free on the street after 6, or if you decide to come much earlier just bring a couple quarters for the meters. I will e-mail my cell number to Yes responders on the day of the event.

Come out for a night of free entertainment! Hope to see you there. This is a joint event with WINGS. Please RSVP on just one site.
item.how_to_find_us: look for me in the lobby -- tall, shoulder-length hair, thick glasses

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: AHA! night in New Bedford
